Mailing Address: c/o CRA Surrey Tax Centre9755 King George BlvdSurrey, BC     V3T 5E1
Service Details: - Coordinates annual volunteer-based income tax preparation clinics for low-income filers - For low-income filers seeking a clinic during tax season, please call 250.763.8008 ext.125
Eligibility: Volunteers must be affiliated with a community organization, have a basic understanding of income tax, register as a volunteer by completing the Online Registration for Individuals, and register for electronic filing through EFILE Registration Online
